channel.title: CVE Feed for Garrett Grimm -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Garrett Grimm -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-38689|2024-08-02T04:19:20.051Z -- garrett%20grimm -- simple%20popup
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Garrett Grimm Simple Popup allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Simple Popup: from n/a through 4.4.
